title: dMRIPrep: a robust preprocessing pipeline for diffusion MRI
description: dMRIPrep is a robust and easy-to-use pipeline for preprocessing of dMRI data. The transparent workflow dispenses of manual intervention, thereby ensuring the reproducibility of the results.
